S.FORM: Peter Aluma 4 bulad 23 demiad, 1973 a mihca, Peter Aluma, miunduay. Peter Aluma nalecuhan i Lagos, Nigeria. Peter Aluma unu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay, u tebanay mimaliay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
